name: DODGE (itch) (Amigo121)
description:
2D platform game, dodge falling objects and collect coins to fly in a rocket.

Game assets created by me using Pixilart.com

Used game audio by Kenney from Kenney-game-assets-1

Menu, game audio and some other stuff is poor due to lack of time (SORRY!)

Made in: GameMaker Studio 2

Made for: ScoreSpace Jam#13 (theme: "dodging")

Controls: 

  • Move in menu - arrow keys
  • Select - ENTER
  • In-game
    Pause - ESC
    Character move left/right - left/right arrow key
    Loading rocket - down arrow key
  • Entering rocket - ENTER
  • Rocket move up/down - up/down arrow key
- other specified in game

Features:

  • 3 skins (Default, "DOGECOIN", Zombie)
  • leaderboard system (top 3) [path: AppData>Local>ScoreSpace_Jam>leaderboard.ini]
  • visual guidance (optional)
  • pause system
